section.section: A person who violates any of the provisions of subsection (a) of this section shall be guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $1,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 6 months or both.

In addition to the penalties under paragraph (1) of this subsection, a person who violates any of the provisions of subsection (a) of this section shall be:
for the first offense, liable for a civil penalty of not less than $10,000 and not exceeding $30,000; and
for a subsequent offense, liable for a civil penalty of not less than $30,000 and not exceeding $50,000.
A person who violates any of the provisions of subsection (a) of this section shall pay all costs and attorney's fees incurred by the plaintiff in a civil action brought under this subtitle.

text.section: The Board shall prohibit a business or person who fails to satisfy the penalties, costs, and attorney's fees imposed under subsection (b) of this section from further contracting with the State until the penalties are satisfied.

section.section: A unit shall report all alleged violations of this section to the Board.

The Board subsequently shall report all alleged violations of this section to the Office of the Attorney General, which shall determine whether to bring a civil action against a person or business for a violation of this section.
